safoja


safoja supplies high quality magentic butterflies for all your butterfly needs

Learn More

Beautiful German made butterflies. Handmade and washable. 1” width x 1.5” length Available in 25 different designs and 36 different colors. Perfect for accent on flower designs, gifts, backgrounds, and many others.

A beautiful gift for loved ones, that creates a lasting memory!
